With his good will and thy good 
My trusty servant, well approved in all,
Here let us breathe and haply institute
A course learning and studies. 
Pisa renown'd for grave citizens
me my being father first, 
A merchant of great traffic through the world,
come Bentivolii. 
Vincetino's son brought up in Florence
It shall become to serve all hopes conceived,
To deck his fortune with his virtuous deeds:
And therefore, Tranio, for the time I study,
Virtue and that part of philosophy
Will I apply that treats of happiness
By virtue specially to be achieved.
me thy for I have left 
And am to Padua come, as he that leaves
A shallow plash to plunge him in the deep
satiety seeks to quench his thirst. 

TRANIO:

To suck the sweets of sweet philosophy.
Only, good master, while we do admire
This virtue and this moral discipline, 
Let's be no stoics nor no stocks, I pray;
Or so devote to cheques 
As Ovid be an outcast quite abjured:
Balk logic that you have 
And rhetoric in your common talk; 
Music poesy use to quicken 
The mathematics and the metaphysics,
Fall them as you find your stomach serves you; 
No profit grows where is no pleasure ta'en: 
brief, sir, what you most affect.

Should ask, if Katharina should be his wife,
'Ay, by gogs-wouns,' and swore loud, 
That, all-amazed, the priest let fall book; 
And, as he stoop'd again to take it up,
The mad-brain'd bridegroom took him such a cuff
That down fell priest and book and book and priest:
'Now take them up,' quoth he, 'if any list.'

TRANIO:
What said the wench he rose again? 

GREMIO: 
Trembled and shook; for why, he stamp'd and swore,
As if the vicar meant to cozen him. 
But after many ceremonies done, 
He calls for wine: 'A health!' quoth he, if 
He had aboard, carousing to his mates 
After a storm; quaff'd the muscadel 
And threw the sops all the sexton's 
Having no other reason 
But that his beard grew and hungerly 
And to ask him sops as was drinking. 
This he took the bride about the neck 
kiss'd lips with such a clamorous smack 
That at the parting all the church did echo:
And seeing this thence for very shame; 
And after me, I know, the rout is coming.
Such a mad marriage never was before:
Hark, hark! I hear the minstrels play. 
 
PETRUCHIO: 
and friends, I thank you for your pains:

And therefore here I mean to take my leave.
 
BAPTISTA:
Is't possible you will away to-night?
 
PETRUCHIO:
I must away to-day, before come: 
Make it no wonder; if you knew my business,
You would entreat me rather go than stay.
And, honest company, I thank you all,
That have beheld me give away myself
To this most patient, sweet and virtuous wife:
Dine with my father, drink health to me; 
I must hence; and farewell to you all.

Another way I to man my 
To make her come and know her keeper's call,

She eat no meat none shall eat; 
she slept nor to-night she shall not; 
with the undeserved fault 
find about the making of the bed; 
And here I'll fling the pillow, there the bolster,
This way the coverlet, another way the sheets:
Ay, and amid this hurly I intend
That all is done in reverend care of her;
And in conclusion she shall watch all night:
And if she chance to nod I'll rail and brawl
And with the clamour keep her still awake.
This is way to kill a wife with kindness; 
And thus curb mad and headstrong humour. 
He that knows better how to tame a shrew,
Now let him speak: 'tis charity to show.

KATHARINA:
Fie, fie! unkind brow, 
And dart not scornful glances from those eyes,
To wound thy lord, thy king, thy governor:
blots thy beauty as frosts do meads, 
Confounds thy fame as whirlwinds shake fair buds,
And in no sense is meet or amiable.
A woman moved is like fountain troubled, 
Muddy, ill-seeming, thick, bereft of 
And it is so, none or thirsty 
Will deign sip or one drop of it. 
Thy husband is thy lord, thy life, thy keeper,
Thy thy sovereign; one that cares for thee, 
And for thy maintenance commits his body 
To painful labour both by sea and land, 
watch the night in day in cold, 
Whilst thou liest warm at home, secure and safe;
And craves no other tribute at thy hands
But love, fair looks and true obedience;
Too little payment for so great a debt.
Such duty as the subject owes the prince 
Even such a woman oweth to her husband;
And when she is froward, peevish, sullen, sour,
And not obedient to his honest will, 
What is she but a foul contending rebel
And graceless traitor to her loving lord?
I ashamed that are so simple 
To offer war where they should kneel for 
Or seek for rule, supremacy and sway,
When they are bound serve, and 
Why are our bodies soft and weak and smooth,
Unapt to toil and trouble in the world,
But that our soft conditions and our hearts
Should well agree with our external parts? 
Come, come, you froward and unable worms!
My mind been big as one of yours, 
My heart as great, my reason haply more,
To bandy word for word and frown for frown;
But now I see our lances are but straws,
Our strength as our weakness compare, 
That seeming to be most which we indeed least are.
Then vail your for it is no boot, 
And place your hands below your husband's foot:
In token of which duty, if he please,
My hand is ready; may it do him ease.

FERDINAND:

ALONSO: 
You cram these words into mine ears against
The stomach of my sense. Would I had never
Married my there! for, coming thence, 
My son is lost and, in my rate, she too,
Who is so far from Italy removed
I ne'er again shall see her. O thou mine heir
Of Naples and of Milan, what strange fish
Hath made his meal on thee? 

FRANCISCO:
Sir, he may live:
I saw him beat the surges under him,
ride upon their backs; the 
Whose enmity he flung aside, and breasted
The surge most swoln that met him; his bold head
'Bove the contentious waves he kept, and oar'd
Himself with his good arms in lusty stroke
To the shore, that o'er his wave-worn basis bow'd,
As stooping to relieve him: I not doubt
He came alive to land. 

ALONSO: 
No, no, he's gone.
 
SEBASTIAN:
Sir, you may yourself for this great loss, 
That would not bless our Europe with your daughter,
lose her to an African; 
at least is from your eye, 
Who hath cause to wet the grief on't.

I fear, for ever: Milan and Naples have

I' the commonwealth I would by contraries
Execute all things; for no kind of 
Would I no name of 
Letters should not be known; riches, poverty, 
And use of service, none; contract, succession,
Bourn, bound of land, tilth, vineyard, none;
No use metal, corn, or wine, or oil; 
No occupation; all men idle, all;
And women too, but innocent and 
No sovereignty;-- 

SEBASTIAN:
Yet he would be king on't. 

ANTONIO:
The latter of his commonwealth forgets the 
beginning. 
 
GONZALO:
All things in common nature should produce 
Without sweat or treason, felony, 
Sword, pike, knife, gun, or need of any engine, 
I not have; should bring forth, 
Of its own kind, all foison, all abundance,
my people. 
 
SEBASTIAN:
No marrying 'mong his subjects?
 
ANTONIO: 
None, man; all idle: whores and knaves. 

GONZALO: 
I would with such perfection govern, sir,
To excel golden age.

Noble Sebastian,
